title: Great Expectations
description: Great Expectations is the thirteenth novel by Charles Dickens and his penultimate completed novel. It depicts the education of an orphan nicknamed Pip.

title: Robinson Crusoe
description: Robinson Crusoe is a novel by Daniel Defoe. The first edition, leading many readers to believe he was a real person and the book a travelogue of true incidents.

title: Mansfield Park
description: Mansfield Park is the third published novel by Jane Austen, first published in 1814 by Thomas Egerton.
